00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/function.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00027 
00028 #include <string>
00029 
00032 namespace clpp {
00033 
00036 namespace detail {
00037 
00043 template< typename ArgType >
00044 struct argument_holder {
00045     typedef boost::function< void ( const ArgType& /* value */ ) >
00046             user_function_with_arg;
00047 public:
00048     explicit argument_holder( void (*fn)( const ArgType& ) ) :
00049             func_with_arg( fn ) {}
00050 
00051     explicit argument_holder( void (*fn)( ArgType ) ) :
00052             func_with_arg( fn ) {}
00053 
00054     template< typename Object >
00055     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00056             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00057     
00058     template< typename Object >
00059     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( const ArgType& ) const ) :
00060             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00061     
00062     template< typename Object >
00063     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( ArgType ) ) :
00064             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00065 
00066     template< typename Object >
00067     explicit argument_holder( Object* obj, void ( Object::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) :
00068             func_with_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj, _1 ) ) {}
00069 public:
00070     user_function_with_arg  func_with_arg;
00071     ArgType                 default_value;
00072 };
00073 
00074 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< bool > >                b_arg_p;
00075 
00076 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< char > >                c_arg_p;
00077 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed char > >         sc_arg_p;
00078 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned char > >       uc_arg_p;
00079 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< const char* > >         cca_arg_p;
00080 
00081 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< int > >                 i_arg_p;
00082 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed int > >          si_arg_p;
00083 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned int > >        ui_arg_p;
00084 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< short int > >           shi_arg_p;
00085 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< long int > >            li_arg_p;
00086 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned long int > >   uli_arg_p;
00087 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< unsigned short int > >  ushi_arg_p;
00088 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed long int > >     sli_arg_p;
00089 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< signed short int > >    sshi_arg_p;
00090 
00091 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< float > >               f_arg_p;
00092 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< double > >              d_arg_p;
00093 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< long double > >         ld_arg_p;
00094 
00095 typedef boost::shared_ptr< argument_holder< std::string > >         s_arg_p;
00096 
00097 } // namespace detail
00098 } // namespace clpp
00099 
00100 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_ARGUMENT_HOLDER_HPP
